name: 极简策略
sort_weights: {"priorities":[{"field":"temp_status","order":"desc","weight":100,"enabled":true,"group":false,"description":"适温状态优先","sort_map":{"ready":1,"waiting":0},"is_prerequisite":true},{"field":"priority","order":"desc","weight":95,"enabled":true,"group":false,"description":"人工干预优先级"},{"field":"product_type","order":"asc","weight":90,"enabled":true,"group":true,"description":"产品大类"},{"field":"storage_days","order":"desc","weight":85,"enabled":true,"group":false,"description":"库龄，久→新"},{"field":"width","order":"desc","weight":80,"enabled":false,"group":true,"description":"宽度优先，宽→窄"},{"field":"hardness_level","order":"asc","weight":75,"enabled":false,"group":true,"description":"硬度等级，软→硬","sort_map":{"软":1,"中":2,"硬":3}},{"field":"thickness","order":"asc","weight":65,"enabled":false,"group":false,"description":"厚度"},{"field":"surface_level","order":"desc","weight":60,"enabled":false,"group":false,"description":"表面等级","sort_map":{"FA":4,"FB":3,"FC":2,"FD":1}},{"field":"steel_grade","order":"asc","weight":55,"enabled":false,"group":true,"description":"钢种"}]}
constraints: {"constraints":[{"type":"temp_status_filter","name":"适温材料筛选","enabled":true,"description":"只有适温材料才可进入排程队列"},{"type":"width_jump","name":"宽度跳跃限制","max_value":100,"unit":"mm","enabled":false,"error_message":"相邻材料宽度差超过{max_value}mm限制"},{"type":"roll_change_tonnage","name":"换辊吨位阈值","max_value":1500,"unit":"吨","enabled":true,"finish_last_coil":true,"description":"达到阈值后当前卷完成后换辊"},{"type":"shift_capacity","name":"班次产能上限","max_value":1000,"unit":"吨","enabled":true},{"type":"roll_change_duration","name":"换辊时长","value":30,"unit":"分钟","enabled":true},{"type":"overdue_priority","name":"超期材料强制优先","max_days":0,"enabled":false,"description":"超期材料必须优先安排"}]}
soft_constraints: {"constraints":[{"type":"steel_grade_switch","name":"钢种切换惩罚","penalty":10,"enabled":false},{"type":"thickness_jump","name":"厚度跳跃惩罚","threshold":1,"penalty":5,"unit":"mm","enabled":false},{"type":"surface_after_roll_change","name":"高表面等级换辊后优先","target_levels":["FA","FB"],"within_coils":5,"bonus":20,"enabled":false},{"type":"contract_grouping","name":"合同材料集中","bonus":10,"enabled":false}]}
eval_weights: {"weights":{"width_jump_count":{"weight":0,"description":"宽度跳跃次数"},"roll_change_count":{"weight":0,"description":"换辊次数"},"capacity_utilization":{"weight":20,"description":"产能利用率"},"tempered_ratio":{"weight":70,"description":"适温材料比例"},"urgent_completion":{"weight":10,"description":"紧急订单完成率"}}}
temper_rules: {"enabled":true,"description":"适温材料判定规则","seasons":{"spring":{"months":[3,4,5],"min_days":3,"description":"春季：3天及以上为适温"},"summer":{"months":[6,7,8],"min_days":4,"description":"夏季：4天及以上为适温"},"autumn":{"months":[9,10,11],"min_days":4,"description":"秋季：4天及以上为适温"},"winter":{"months":[12,1,2],"min_days":3,"description":"冬季：3天及以上为适温"}}}
